short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple task manager to keep track of daily tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay organized and boost your productivity with the To-Do List Chrome Extension. Easily add, manage, and delete tasks directly from your browser. Keep track of your daily to-dos with a clean and user-friendly interface. Your tasks are saved securely, so you never lose them. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone looking to streamline their day. Simplify your life, one task at a time!
